attributes.action: Allow indoor gyms to open including private, plc and body line gyms
attributes.additional_details: Well for one it helps mental health! What more can people say but to be stable during a pandemic? However it keeps us all fit during the hard times of not leaving homes. With this it will also help local businesses begin to still feed people’s families. Not everyone has financial means to live on furlough or be without a job
attributes.background: Open all indoor gyms to help mental health! Exercise releases endorphins which help mental health. We all just want to exercise safely
